message:
You may not like it some CIA are assigned to diplomatic posts but they are. And our government designates who is a diplomat untitled to diplomatic immunity not foriegn countries.

‎"The Guardian noted in its article that Davis's wife had provided phone numbers for information about him... & those numbers turned out to be the CIA. Meanwhile, Agence France Press reported over the weekend that Sen. Lindsay Graham (R-SC)... slipped up & disclosed on the Senate floor that Davis is an 'agent,' saying, 'We can't throw this agent over.'"

http://www.activistpost.com/2011/02/us-caught-in-big-lie-pakistan.html
